gomoku.description: Gomoku is the simplest of the games. To win, place 5 of your stones in a straight continuous line (either horizontally, vertically or diagonally). Whoever does this first wins the game. One note, you must get exactly 5 in a row to win. 6 or more of your stones in a row is called an 'overline' and does not count as a win, play continues.
